name: Puppy Care Pet Dog Kennel
description:
The cute puppy pet dog house game is here for you!! Download the fun filled animal care in which you will do some caring, feeding and dress up of your beloved little puppy. Enjoy the awesome fun with different interactive activities of newborn cute animal in the best daycare nursery simulator. Become the owner of the cutest newborn puppy care nursery. Be the kindest newborn animal pet sitter. If you are the animal lover then you will definitely going to enjoy this fun animal daycare simulator.

Start your day with taking care of the cutest baby puppy pet. Select you favorite cute puppy pet now. Let’s do the newborn baby feed. The cute pet is injured a little bit so first start his treatment and then feed him properly. Give him the proper bath, clean the dirt from his body as he was playing in the muddy playground with his friend and owner. The owner left the fluffy little dog house at your baby sitter daycare nursery for dream pet care.

Now get yourself ready for the happy puppy care and feed. Take good care of the baby animal in the newborn nursery. Enjoy loving the cute animal now. First, you need to give him the proper bath by cleaning all the dirt from his body. The newborn baby puppy has been injured from multiple areas on the body. Give him the proper dressing and treatment so that the cute puppy will not feel the pain. Pet care is the first priority in this little dog house animal daycare center.

Treat the puppy pet like your own dream pet in this cute puppy land. After giving him the proper treatment and dressing on his wounds. Now, the little animal is very hungry. Feed him with his favorite food items like dog food, milk, meat and biscuits. Don’t give him broccoli and cupcakes as he doesn’t like them at all. Enjoy the interactive high resolution graphics of the puppy pet animal daycare nursery. The best baby care and baby feed simulator game is now available for you. So enjoy this fun activity of caring the newborn puppy.

HOW TO PLAY
Tap to start the fun baby pet care simulator
Select your favorite cute puppy among 4 little dog
Now select the scene among 4 scenes of the pet care
First give proper bath including dirt cleaning
Now check-up and dressing of newborn baby
Feed him with his favorite food items
Time to dress him up

FEATURES
Baby day care nursery simulator
Different selection for the fluffy puppy animal
Unlock all scenes through rewarded video
Interactive HD gameplay graphics
Multiple scenes for the puppy care to select
